describe: Kyrgyzstan is a landlocked country in Central Asia, known for its mountainous terrain, rich nomadic culture, and vibrant history. It is bordered by Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, and China. The country is famous for its natural beauty, including the Tien Shan mountain range and the stunning Lake Issyk-Kul.

cities.name: üåÜ Bishkek
cities.geographical_location: Located in the north of Kyrgyzstan, near the border with Kazakhstan.
cities.climate: Bishkek has a continental climate with hot summers and cold winters.

cities.name: üèî Osh
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the Fergana Valley in the south of Kyrgyzstan.
cities.climate: Osh experiences a continental climate with hot summers and mild winters.

cities.name: üïå Karakol
cities.geographical_location: Located near the eastern tip of Lake Issyk-Kul.
cities.climate: Karakol has a cold semi-arid climate with cold winters and warm summers.
